>
[Phoenix Fighting Fan](/Equipment.aspx?ID=945)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 75

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Fighting Fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) [fighting fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93)_ features sharp silver feathers instead of traditional paper leaves in its design.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> command, envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You call upon the fan's extradimensional powers to trap a creature in Hao Jin's repository, a small demiplane that holds the countless relics Hao Jin collected over her lifetime (though a trapped creature cannot interact with any of these relics). The fighting fan casts [_maze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=187) on a creature within 30 feet. The fan automatically Sustains the Spell as long as you Strike a creature with it each round. The [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) or Perception DC to escape the demiplane is 34. The spell ends once the creature escapes, you fail to Strike a creature with the fan during a round, or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 10 minutes (envision, Interact);     **Effect** The fan casts 8th-level [_raise dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=243), consuming the _phoenix fighting fan_ in the process.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
